txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the beasts surrounding the outpost at Kauppa-kohta. Deliver the items to Santtu at Kauppa-kohta.
'This helps us and all of our people. Thank you.'
'Our hunts have been slowed since the arrival of the winds from the east. We are behind on collecting furs and skins from the beasts in the woods.'
Santtu at the Lossoth outpost of Kauppa-kohta awaits a delivery of pure black skin.
Deliver the pure black skin to Santtu at Kauppa-kohta in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black skin from the beasts in the woods surrounding Kauppa-khota to Santtu, a Lossoth watching over the outpost.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the beasts surrounding the outpost at Kauppa-kohta.
